cards.title: The Technology Demands It

cards.excerpt: Modern day technologies like 5G, IOT, AI,... demand more cloud resources near end-users. The central datacenter approach can't keep up with this deman.  The ThreeFold Grid can cater to all the needs these industries as the decentralized nature of the the grid puts the capacity near the end user.

cards.title: The People Demand It

cards.excerpt: Thanks to the help of multiple documentaries (The Social Dilemma, The Great Hack, etc) it has become apparent to the masses that things need to change if we want to allow the internet to play such a big role in our lives.
